subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams needed 59 minutes to beat her fellow American Varvara Lepchenko, 6-2, 6-1, in the first round of the Brisbane International in Australia.
snippet: Serena Williams needed 59 minutes to beat her fellow American Varvara Lepchenko, 6-2, 6-1, in the first round of the Brisbane International in Australia.
